author: Jessica
excerpt: 1. I think we are eating two cantaloupes and two watermelons every week, at least. Whole family is obsessed. 2. All I want to make are these shiny crinkly brownies! 3. We’re having family reading time every morning as soon as school ends and I am so excited about it. 30 minutes every day… and […]
text: 1. I think we are eating two cantaloupes and two watermelons every week, at least. Whole family is obsessed. 2. All I want to make are these shiny crinkly brownies! 3. We’re having family reading time every morning as soon as school ends and I am so excited about it. 30 minutes every day… and I can’t wait. 4. Speaking of, I’m reading Carley Fortune’s newest and loving it! What are you reading? My summer reading list drops in less than two weeks! 5. I totally forgot about Target food courts! 6. TV things!! The end of Your Friends and Neighbors… ahhh! I also watched Nonnas (so cute) and the Deadly American Marriage on netflix. 7. What interior designers really think of Nancy Meyers! 8. I ask this like twice a year – what are your current favorite podcasts?! Esp true crime. Ha. 9. The melamine lazy susan above is something I use almost every single day. Major fave! I even take it on vacation now.
html:
1. I think we are eating two cantaloupes and two watermelons every week, at least. Whole family is obsessed.

2. All I want to make are these shiny crinkly brownies!

3. We’re having family reading time every morning as soon as school ends and I am so excited about it. 30 minutes every day… and I can’t wait.

4. Speaking of, I’m reading Carley Fortune’s newest and loving it! What are you reading? My summer reading list drops in less than two weeks!

5. I totally forgot about Target food courts!

6. TV things!! The end of Your Friends and Neighbors… ahhh! I also watched Nonnas (so cute) and the Deadly American Marriage on netflix.

7. What interior designers really think of Nancy Meyers!

8. I ask this like twice a year – what are your current favorite podcasts?! Esp true crime. Ha.

9. The melamine lazy susan above is something I use almost every single day. Major fave! I even take it on vacation now.
